responses: Sorry, I don't understand. Please ask a question related to the application.
What can I do for you?

To create a new company, you first have you sign in to your account, and then go to the dashboard page by clicking on `dashboard` on the navbar at the top, Once you are in there, click on the green "+" button near bottom right, fill out all the necessary form data, and then click the `Add` button on the bottom
To edit an existing company, you click on the pencil icon on the top right of the company card
To delete an existing company, you click on the trash can icon on the top right of the company card
To view company details, you click the company card. Inside here, you can see the company's title, description, location with 3d rendering, and company contacts
To filter through companies, you type in what company you want to search on the search bar at the top, and then press enter after you are done entering.
To log in, you click on the white "Log In" button on the top right corner. If you are already logged in, you should see your profile at the top right corner
To create an account, you click on the green "Sign Up" button on the top right corner, or you can click the yellow "Get started" button in the homepage

patterns: how to find location of company
responses: To see the company's location via map, you first have to create a company. After you create a company, go back to the dashboard page, and you should see your company there. Click on the company and inside the details page you'll see the location of the company rendered in 3d
To log out, you click on your profile, which should bring a dropdown menu, and then click "Log Out"
To add a company's address/location, you click on the pencil icon on the top right corner of the company you want to create location with, and then edit the "address" field
To add resources to your company, you click on the pencil icon on the top right corner of the company you want to add resources to, and then in the resources field, insert new resources.
To add contacts, you click on the pencil icon on the top right corner of the company you want to add contact with, and change the contact field
To edit your account, you click on your profile, and in the dropdown menu, click on "profile", and inside the profile page, you can edit your profile information by clicking on the pencil icons
